name: Veg Patch
description:
A game made for the Safe Space Now 2021 Jam. Follow Chris as he goes about a day in his life as a junior game designer at Tsunami Studios...except today isn't a Normal Day. Chris realizes he has the ability to time travel-- will he use his powers to help support his co-workers?

CONTENT WARNINGS:

This game includes depictions of sexual harassment and workplace abuse, please play with care!
